title: Sayonara Freeway

alternative_titles.ja: サヨナラフリーウェイ

synopsis:
Due to a certain incident three years ago, the Maigahara Senior High School light music club was tragically disbanded. Moreover, Nanase Hagiwara, who was the president at that time, had to drop out of her studies. Now returning as a third-year student, Nanase finally has a chance to make things right once again.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
